title: Museum-Based Health Promotion Education: Practitioner Competency Development through Participatory Discussions

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Professional development for museum practitioners to design and implement health promotion education using exhibits. Requires learners’ smartphone proficiency and group discussion participation

learning_goals: Learners can develop a health promotion education program design framework by analyzing museum exhibition cases.
Learners can create an educational scenario that explores community health issues using participatory discussion techniques.
Learners can produce educational materials addressing health-related social issues (e.g., chronic disease management, mental health awareness) through collaborative learning.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
